abilities.name: Rites of Feasting
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability. If that unit destroys one or more enemy units in the Fight phase, until the end of the battle, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability instead.

abilities.name: Ritual Butchery
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[SUSTAINED HITS 1]** ability.
